mapper.select: SELECT board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent, COUNT(comment.cno) AS comment_count FROM board LEFT JOIN comment ON board.bno = comment.bno WHERE board.btype = 1 GROUP BY board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent ORDER BY board.bno DESC;
SELECT board.mno, board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent, board.bdate, board.bcalldibs, member.mnickname FROM board JOIN member ON board.mno = member.mno WHERE board.bno = #{bno};

SELECT comment.mno, comment.cno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent FROM comment LEFT JOIN board ON comment.bno = board.bno WHERE board.bno = #{bno} GROUP BY comment.mno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent ORDER BY comment.cno ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, bdate, btype, mno) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bdate}, #{btype}, #{mno})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bcalldibs = CASE WHEN bcalldibs IS NULL THEN #{mno} ELSE CONCAT(bcalldibs, ',', #{mno}) END WHERE bno=#{bno}

UPDATE board SET bcalldibs = CASE WHEN CONCAT(',', bcalldibs, ',') LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{mno}, ',%') THEN TRIM(BOTH ',' FROM REPLACE(CONCAT(',', bcalldibs, ','), CONCAT(',', #{mno}, ','), ',')) ELSE bcalldibs END WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(cno) FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, mno, ccontent, cdate) VALUES (#{bno}, #{mno}, #{ccontent}, #{cdate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} AND cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rpno) FROM report WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rpreporterno = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (rpreporterno, bno, rpcontent, rpurl, rpdate, mno) VALUES (#{mno}, #{bno}, #{rpcontent}, #{rpurl}, #{rpdate}, (SELECT mno FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rpno) FROM report WHERE cno = #{cno} AND rpreporterno = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (rpreporterno, rpcontent, rpurl, rpdate, cno, mno) VALUES (#{mno}, #{rpcontent}, #{rpurl}, #{rpdate}, #{cno}, (SELECT mno FROM comment WHERE cno = #{cno}))
